definition: The word "hinauf" refers to the action of moving or going upwards, typically in a physical sense. It is commonly used to describe ascending or climbing to a higher position or level.

examples.german: Der Ball rollte die Rampe hinauf.
examples.english: The ball rolled up the ramp.

examples.german: Wir fuhren mit dem Aufzug hinauf.
examples.english: We went up with the elevator.

examples.german: Der Vogel flog in den Himmel hinauf.
examples.english: The bird flew up into the sky.
